name: dasheen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical plant that has a root and leaves that are cooked and eaten: Dasheen is a root vegetable with a nutty flavour that is used in many recipes. In the Caribbean, dasheen leaves are made into a spicy stew. Synonym
taro
More examplesFewer examplesMix one part grated raw dasheen to three parts of flour.The dish is made from thinly sliced dasheen fried in deep fat. He grows dasheen and bananas on his small farm.The steak is marinated with lime and pepper, then fried and served with dasheen fries.Spinach is a good substitute if you cannot get dasheen.
